#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define mod 1000000007
#define si(i) scanf("%lld",&i);
#define pi(i) printf("%lld",i);
#define rep(i,st,end) for(i=st;i<end;i++) 


int main(){
    
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    	freopen("in","r",stdin);
    	freopen("out","w",stdout);
	#endif
    
	ll t;
	si(t);	
	while(t--){
		ll n,k;
		si(n); si(k);
		ll arr[n];
		ll tmp,cnt=0;
		for(ll i=0;i<n;i++){
			si(tmp);
			if(tmp>k) cnt++;
		}
		pi(cnt);
		printf("\n");
	}
    return 0;
}
